Stephen D. Hogan (1948 – May 13, 2018) was an American politician. He served as the Mayor of Aurora, Colorado from November 2011 until his death in May 2018. Hogan was a member of the Republican Party. He sat on the Colorado House of Representatives between 1975 and 1976. He was born in Lincoln, Nebraska.
His mayoralty received international attention when twelve people were killed during the 2012 Aurora shooting.
Hogan died of cancer on May 13, 2018 in Aurora at the age of 69.
